tool_description: Calculates potential revenue, expenses, and profit margins for performances at specific venues considering ticket prices, capacity, and performance fees.

venue_capacity.description: Maximum audience capacity of the venue

expected_attendance_rate.description: Expected attendance as percentage of capacity (0-100)

performer_fee.description: Performer fee or revenue share percentage

error_messages: Invalid capacity: venue_capacity must be a positive integer greater than 0.
Invalid ticket price: ticket_price must be greater than 0.
Invalid attendance rate: expected_attendance_rate must be between 0 and 100.
Invalid performer fee: performer_fee must be non-negative.
Invalid expenses: venue_expenses must be non-negative.
usage: Provide venue capacity, ticket pricing, expected attendance rate, and fee structure to calculate revenue projections and profitability metrics.

performer_earnings.description: Expected performer earnings after venue share

break_even_attendance.description: Minimum attendance needed to break even
